name: Noshiki
wishText: Cheers to another year of you being awesome;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText:
Happy Birthday to my dearest friend! ðŸŽ‰

Today marks another beautiful year of your life, and I am so grateful to have shared the past decade with you. Our journey together has been filled with countless memories, laughter. We've faced ups and downs, but through it all, our friendship has only grown stronger.
You are an incredible person, and I am truly blessed to have you in my life. Here's to many more years of friendship, love, and happiness. May this year bring you all the joy and success you deserve.
Happy Birthday! ðŸŽ‚
